name: The Titan's grave
description:
( NOTE : WebGL version might be slow. )

Every time the titan hits you, he grows in strength. While every time you hit the titan, you grow in strength. Break out of this loop and defeat the titan

Ludum Dare 47 page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/the-titans-grave

Follow me on twitter if you like what you see :) https://twitter.com/BadPiggyproduc1

Controls:

-  Hold  'Z'  to shoot

- Press  'X'  to roll in the direction you are moving in

- Use the arrow keys to move

- Press  'E'  to exit the game (for the downloadable version only)
